text.tspan: Example ancestor graph and checkpoint mis-alignment
Example ancestor graph and checkpoint alignment

tspan.tspan: Aligning Probabilistic Programs for Sequential Monte Carlo Inference
In this presentation, we illustrate a design pattern to improve the efficiency of probabilistic programs
for birth-death models of evolution coupled with sequential Monte Carlo inference. Download our
phylogenetic probabilistic programming language, TreePPL, and try for yourself!
